reviews.review_msg: Re: last 2 comments: Of course there's reading responses & participation! The course is literally categorized as a SEMINAR. Prof might be on the bland side, but she does what she can for such dry materials. Sonja is also very caring and definitely an easy marker. If you try even just a little, you will easily get full marks for weekly responses too

Very seminar based. Get ready for weekly reading responses and make sure you attend class otherwise you will be lost because most of the content is not posted in lecture. Overall she cares about the topic but she is very uninteresting and dry. Definitely an easy marker though.

okay so I had her for SA322 and wow I didn't know anyone could be so boring. I literally fell asleep during the lecture at one point im not kidding. you can bs your way through it but its a huge pain because she is so uninteresting to listen to. do not recommend.

Bascom has a great personality and is a pleasant person to be around, but he gives a lot of readings per week. Or at least what I feel is a lot, which is about two articles every week with an average of 30-40 pages each and they are often wordy/dense. He will also make you do lots of discussions related to the material so you have to read it all.
Classes were really fun, he was really approachable and gave feedback. Lectures weren't boring, we got to watch videos, participation was fun and classes felt like a natural dialogue.
Best prof I have ever had.
